name: Open DICOMweb SDK
tagline: An open source toolkit for DICOMweb applications.
body:
### Welcome to the Open DICOMweb (ODW) SDK
The ODW SDK is an open source toolkit for developing Web-based applications for medical imaging.  It conforms to the 
[DICOM](http://dicom.nema.org) Standard.  The toolkit's goals, in order, are:
  1. Correctness
  2. Simplicity
  3. Readability, and
  4. Efficiency

### Authors and Contributors
Jim Philbin (@jfphilbin) is the creator of the toolkit.  Anyone interested in contributing is welcome.
